body: The translator here. My computer screen has a crack in from being dropped, the colors on the screen are messed up from it, so when I actually translate the pages the colors are different from how it looks on my computer. (I just wanted to give an explanation of why the colors are brightened to help others understand why their eyes are becoming blind, and to replace the computer is too much money, so this is fine.).
I read this at night, shit almost leaves me blind
Its so saturated i think my eyes are burning
